data.name: Bonding Ambivalence
data.detailed_description:
Second half of the 21st century, the world is undergoing major changes. The climate and energy crisis are felt around the world. Society has relied on powerful multinational corporations like Genetech Biosystems to improve the Earth's livability. You and your teammate are called upon to investigate the sudden shutdown of one of their research sites. The site, based in Paris, France, is dedicated to transhumanism.

The new challenges created by digital technology have compelled the state to create new police departments. You are part of the USAC task force, the French Special Unit against Cyber Attacks. To carry out your mission, you will have to cooperate in a duo composed of an infiltration agent and a digital operator.

Infiltration Agent

Thanks to his wide range of gadgets, he is the specialist in surgical operations on physical systems. His optimized equipment and his special suit give him an increased mobility, perfectly adapted to recon.

Digital Operator

A powerful defensive agent and an excellent hacker, he’s equipped with multiple weapons and has additional storage. In the field, he is an interface between the digital and the physical.


The choice is yours.

Listening, communication and observation will be key skills to prevent the environment from turning against you. Don't lose sight of each other. If one of you fails, the mission fails.

Are you sure you want to proceed?

Based on a French cyberpunk universe, Bonding Ambivalence is a unique cooperative experience. Throughout the adventure, you will have to progress in an environment full of obstacles that you’ll have to bypass with the help of your partner or your brain.

Bonding Ambivalence features

  • Communication-based teamwork - Work together to overcome and survive
  • Asymmetrical roles - Both players have different and specific functions
  • Bypassing hurdles - Technical operations under stress, immersive hacking close to a real coding mechanic
  • Shooting phases - Use the weapons at your disposal to defend yourself against diverse threats
  • Dystopian narrative in a plausible near future - Impact of climate and energy crisis, influence of transhumanism on human societies

data.short_description: Bonding Ambivalence is a unique coop experience based on a French cyberpunk universe. As a special police unit, you and your partner are brought to investigate a sudden shutdown of a research facility. Between reflection and action, you must survive a situation that is beyond you.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (3.2 GHz) / AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Requires an internet connection. Requires a working PC-compatible microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (3.2 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Requires an internet connection. Requires a working PC-compatible microphone

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work. Violence and gore, anxious atmosphere and general mature content is present.
